title: Why are people mad for buying iPhones? - Quora

response.answer_text: ​Its the basic human tendency for belonging to an 'exclusive club'. To own something that is uncommon so as to feel a bit elevated in stature. Its this belief among certian section of society that prompts them to be a part of iphone mania. There would be few among this crowd who would actually buy an iph for certain rational techincalities which aren't available with the alternatives. However, the major proportion of this club buys an iphone due to sheer 'kick' they derive by owning a 'sanctimonious gadget' in their eyes. ​  ​ Sent from my iphone Plus limited Gold Edition

I don’t think it’s about iPhones, it’s about people. There are some people who want to get their hands on things first. When these kind of people want iPhone, they stand in queue apple stores. I don’t think it’s about showing off or status symbol, there are plenty of android phone which cost same or more than an iPhone.
